list-view-config.query-select:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX vitro: <http://vitro.mannlib.cornell.edu/ns/vitro/0.7#> PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/> PREFIX fhd: <http://vivo.fredhutch.org/ontology/display#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?training ?trainingName ?date WHERE { ?subject ?property ?training . ?training a fhd:Degree . ?training rdfs:label ?trainingName . OPTIONAL { ?training core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?date . } } ORDER BY DESC(?date)
